snippet: Federico Delbonis of Argentina upset sixth-seeded Fabio Fognini of Italy 6-7 (4), 6-4, 6-4 in the first round of the Argentina Open on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Federico Delbonis of Argentina upset sixth-seeded Fabio Fognini of Italy 6-7 (4), 6-4, 6-4 in the first round of the Argentina Open on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Delbonis Upsets Fognini to Reach 2nd Round in Argentina
headline.main: Delbonis Upsets Fognini to Reach 2nd Round in Argentina
